Support your Immune System with
NaturesPlus Herbal Actives.
NaturesPlus has some of the best products to support a healthy
immune system. Including Tri-Immune, Zinc Lozenges, Olive
Leaf and a variety of Vitamin C for the whole family.
Please remit payment via bank transfer and reference your customer number.
Product is intended for sale in the UK and for your direct sale to end consumers only. Diversion is prohibited. Use of third party
websites to sell product is prohibited. Products sold through unauthorised channels cannot be returned. Accepting delivery of this
order indicates agreement to our terms and conditions. See price list for further details.

Tri-Immune Extended Release Tablets combine Olive Leaf, Arabino-
galactans and Andrographis. Tri-Immune is a synergistic immune
formula that offers the ultimate natural defense.
Immune Actin Zinc Lozenges are a botanical food supplement that
combine Zinc, Vitamin C, Elderberry, Olive Leaf, Wood Ear
Mushroom, Maitake, Shitake and Oyster Mushrooms is a convenient
and soothing raspberry and cherry flavoured lozenge.
Ask your NaturesPlus Rep for more information.
Please remit payment via bank transfer and reference your customer number.
Product is intended for sale in the UK and for your direct sale to end consumers only. Diversion is prohibited. Use of third party
websites to sell product is prohibited. Products sold through unauthorised channels cannot be returned. Accepting delivery of this
